name: Asteria Conflict
description:
The Universe has been conquered by alien forces. It is now up on you to save it and end Alien rule, but will you be able to do it?

You are recruited to join the emerging industry of Space tasked to clean the orbit. Save the the Universe.

It's not easy. You're in a race against dwindling resources, and systems break down rapidly. Your crew are your only hope.

Assets and Music:

https://ansimuz.itch.io/minitroid
